T02TD2086E:161b-1: tree satva sa m'a dhi sa m'a pa tti n'a ma //
T02TD2086E:161b-3: sems dpa' gsum gyi ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par gzhag pa zhes bya ba /
T02TD2086E:161b-4: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2086E:161b-5: bskyed pa'i rim la legs gnas nas //
T02TD2086E:161b-6: rdzogs pa'i rim pa 'dod rnams kyis //
T02TD2086E:161b-7: rim gnyis rnam par gnas nas ni //
T02TD2086E:161b-8: spros pa med pa'i rang bzhin la //
T02TD2086E:161b-9: spros dang spros med ro mnyam blta //
T02TD2086E:161b-10: lam gyi snying por bsten pa ltar //
T02TD2086E:161b-11: gti mug dus dgra'i sku sogs su //
T02TD2086E:161b-13: gtso bo 'pho ba'i tshul du bsam //
T02TD2086E:161b-14: brtan nas ye shes sems dpa' ni //
T02TD2086E:161b-16: dngos kun dus dgra'i skur thal nas /
T02TD2086E:162a-0: @162a * // bsdus te bdag la thim gyur pas //
T02TD2086E:162a-1: bdag nyid yar thim thig ler gyur //
T02TD2086E:162a-2: thig ler ye shes 'khor lo dgod //
T02TD2086E:162a-3: de yi 'od kyi phreng ba yis //
T02TD2086E:162a-4: bdag sogs lha rnams gsal bar blta //
T02TD2086E:162a-6: snying ga'i ya yig dbus kyi h'um //
T02TD2086E:162a-7: spro dang bsdu ba'i rnal 'byor gyis //
T02TD2086E:162a-8: ji ltar dbugs rlung me long la //
T02TD2086E:162a-9: thim pa ji bzhin h'um yig bsam //
T02TD2086E:162a-10: chu skyes padma'i lte ba'i h'um //
T02TD2086E:162a-11: yungs kar tshad tsam aa la thim //
T02TD2086E:162a-12: snang ba 'od gsal ngang du rdzogs //
T02TD2086E:162a-13: dang ba'i chu las nya ldang bzhin //
T02TD2086E:162a-14: thams cad stong pa'i ting 'dzin las //
T02TD2086E:162a-15: mtha' drug dkyil 'khor rdzogs pa ni //
T02TD2086E:162a-16: rtag chad bdag gzhan ma yin la //
T02TD2086E:162a-18: phyi rol gzugs sogs yul snang rnams //
T02TD2086E:162a-19: bu ga'i lha yi snying gar bsdu //
T02TD2086E:162a-20: nang gi rnam rtog lha sku rnams //
T02TD2086E:162a-21: me shel lta bur snying gar thim //
T02TD2086E:162a-23: skar mda' lta bur rab 'phros pas //
T02TD2086E:162a-24: nam mkha'i bu ga rab 'byams khyab //
T02TD2086E:162a-25: rnal 'byor bzhi yi rim pa las //
T02TD2086E:162a-26: gang skyes ye shes phyag rgya che //
T02TD2086E:162a-27: mkha' ltar rang rig stong pa nyid //
T02TD2086E:162a-28: ro gcig mkha' mnyam ye shes bsgom //
T02TD2086E:162a-29: thog mtha' dbus kyi dbye ba yis //
T02TD2086E:162a-30: 'dir yang gcig tu yod min te //
T02TD2086E:162a-31: rdul phran la ni cha med phyir //
T02TD2086E:162a-32: du mar yang ni grub pa yin //
T02TD2086E:162a-33: gcig dang du ma'i rang bzhin du //
T02TD2086E:162a-34: gang zhig bral te chos nyid yin //
T02TD2086E:162a-36: sems kyi rang bzhin 'khrul pa med //
T02TD2086E:162a-37: bskyed rim spro bsdus sems rtogs don //
T02TD2086E:162a-38: ro gcig gyur pa chos kyi dbyings //
T02TD2086E:162a-39: de la byang chub mngon rtogs med //
T02TD2086E:162a-40: dngos por ma grub bsgom pa min //
T02TD2086E:162a-41: khams kyang min zhing rnam shes min //
T02TD2086E:162a-42: nam mkha'i dkyil dang mtshungs pa nyid //
T02TD2086E:162a-43: nam mkha' lta bur bdag med pa'i //
T02TD2086E:162a-44: chos ni bde ba chen po'o //
T02TD2086E:162a-45: 'byung bzhi ma yin nam mkha' min //
T02TD2086E:162a-46: rdo rje sems dpa'i sbyor ba yin //
T02TD2086E:162a-47: bskyed pa 'di la rab tu gnas //
T02TD2086E:162a-48: kun rdzob dngos kun dngos po min //
T02TD2086E:162a-49: de phyir de la dngos med bsgrag / rnal 'byor sems kyi sems rig pa //
T02TD2086E:162a-50: rtag chad phyag zhal sku mdog dang //
T02TD2086E:162b-0: gnyis @162b 'dzin dngos kun bden mod kyang //
T02TD2086E:162b-1: 'gag med nyams la sna tshogs snang //
T02TD2086E:162b-2: de ltar rig byas dkyil 'khor mchog / phung po khams su bdag med pa //
T02TD2086E:162b-3: bde ba dam pa'i gzugs can bsgom //
T02TD2086E:162b-4: sems dpa' gsum gyi rnal 'byor bzhi //
T02TD2086E:162b-7: spros pa thams cad rab zhi nas //
T02TD2086E:162b-8: spros med ye shes mngon sum du //
T02TD2086E:162b-9: 'gro ba kun gyis myong gyur nas //
T02TD2086E:162b-10: dus dgra mngon du byed gyur cig / bcom ldan 'das gshin rje'i gshed kyi bskyed rdzogs zung du 'jug pa'i man ngag sems dpa' gsum gyi ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par gzhag pa zhes bya ba /
T02TD2086E:162b-11: rdo rje phag ros dngos su byin gyis brlabs pa /
T02TD2086E:162b-12: mkhas shing grub pa brnyes pa'i rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug sangs rgyas ye shes zhabs kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so /
T02TD2086E:162b-14: // / yul dbus kyi pandi ta a'a nanda bha dra dang /
T02TD2086E:162b-15: bod kyi lo ts'a bsod nams rgyal mtshan gyis grong khyer chen po ti ra ha ti'i lho phyogs rang byung gi mchod rten rnam par dag pa'i drung du yul dbus kyi dpe dang mthun par bsgyur zhing bcos te gtan la phab pa /
T02TD2086E:162b-16: slar yang grub thob karna shr'i'i zhal snga nas mnyan te thar pa lo ts'a ba nyi ma rgyal mtshan gyis shr'i na lendra'i gtsug lag khang chen por bsgyur ba'o//
